name: Senior Flutter Developer
description:
Location: Remote (anywhere in the world)

Salary: Competitive and commensurate with experience. We are a US-based company and can afford top tier European and Asian salaries.

The college lecture hasn’t fundamentally changed in centuries. We’ve seen technology touch every aspect of our lives and yet today’s students sit and passively listen to their professors lecture exactly like they did in the middle ages.

101 transforms the college STEM lecture with a unique active learning platform. We focus on elegant, discipline-specific interactive assessment tools that triumph over traditional and generic multiple choice systems (and we’ve got the data to back it up too!). Our first product for college chemistry, Chem101, has been quickly adopted at over 400 higher ed institutions and we’re just getting started. Check out some of our innovative tools here: www.101edu.co.

We’re a VC backed team of scientists, engineers, and educators who are redefining the way students learn and interact with their subject-matter. We're looking for a Staff Frontend Engineer to lead a brand new stealth special project. This is not a typical mobile app development role. You will write many custom interactions, implement complex drag and drop behavior, and paint custom UI directly to the canvas. This position reports directly to the CTO. Join us and change the college STEM learning experience forever!

Tech Stack:

• Brand new Flutter codebase (targeting iOS, Android, and web platforms)

• Spring backend using MongoDB as our primary database

Requirements:

• Mission driven: you know the traditional college lecture is broken and you want to do something about it

• Proficiency with Dart and the Flutter framework

• Enjoy writing custom user interfaces with unique, never before seen interactions

• At least 2 years of professional experience in mobile application development

• Strong knowledge of object-oriented design patterns

• Strong algorithms and data structures background

• Strong work ethic - we’re here to change education and get the job done

Good to Haves:

• Background in a STEM field

• Native iOS or Android development experience

• Experience with Java

• Experience working in a cross-functional environment

• Experience with AWS

• Experience with MongoDB
